Package com.game.account

Class Account

java.lang.Object
com.game.account.Account
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<Account>
public class Account extends Object implements Comparable<Account>
Object of this class represents player's account

  • Constructor Details

    • Account

      public Account(String userName, long score)
      This constructor saves player's user name and score.
      Parameters:
      userName - Player's user name.
      score - Player's score of current round.

    • Account

      public Account()
      This constructor runs through process of checking and saving player's user name and score. Accounts previously saved are added into empty ArrayList. ArrayList is cleared and re-added with new list after saving new details.

  • Method Details

    • compareTo

      public int compareTo(Account user)
      This method compares high scores of all player's saved.
      Specified by:
      compareTo in interface Comparable<Account>
      Parameters:
      user - Current Player's account.
      Returns:
      the higher score.

    • toString

      This method represents Account objects in String.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      Player's user name and score in string.

      This method creates a file to store accounts.
      Parameters:

      public void addUser(Account account)
      This method saves an account into a text file.
      Parameters:
      account - Current player's account.

    • getUserList

      public void getUserList()
      This method reads all previous account from file and adds into accounts ArrayList.

    • updateScore

      public void updateScore(Account account)
      This method overwrites current score of account in file if a new high score is achieved.
      Parameters:
      account - Current player's account.

    • compareScore

      public boolean compareScore(Account account)
      This method checks if current score is higher than previous highest score.
      Parameters:
      account - Current player's account.
      Returns:
      True current score is higher, false if otherwise.

    • sortByScore

      public void sortByScore()
      This method sorts all saved accounts from highest score to lowest.

    • accountHaveBeenExist

      public Account accountHaveBeenExist(String userName)
      This method checks if the user name entered has been saved before.
      Parameters:
      userName - Player's account name.
      Returns:
      account if user name was found, null otherwise.

    • makeNewAccount

      public Account makeNewAccount(String userName)
      This method adds current user name into accounts ArrayList.
      Parameters:
      userName - Player's account name.
      Returns:
      account added into ArrayList.
